titleStmt.title: The vvorkes of mercy, both corporall, and spirituall
titleStmt.author: Crane, Ralph.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by G. Eld and M. Flesher,

notesStmt.note: The words "corporall, and spirituall." are bracketed together on the title page.
The first leaf and the last leaf are blank.
The dedication comes in three versions: (1) to L. Munck; (2) to John [Egerton] Earl of Bridgewater; (3) to Mrs. D. Osborne.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
